body: Forum poll: What's your favorite chiptune band & why?
I'd definitely go with POWERLIFTER. Love the use of LSDJ & vocals.

Hm, I hadn't heard of them before. Will give a listen.

My favorite is definitely D&D Sluggers so far.
Oh man, POWERLIFTER is really good. Do they have any more albums than the first one?
Yeah, check out their site. The second album has been out for a bit & is just as good.
I'm working on my latest & having some trouble. I've got compression on my drum track but I still can't keep the drum for muddying the bass line without losing clarity on the hats. :( Help?
Thanks for the tip! I'll have to check it out!
Have you tried using side-chaining the compression? That'll allow the bass' input to control the volume of the drums based on when it's playing.
